pages.text: A rune associated with speed and wind.
$(l)In World$()$(br)$(li)Wield: Sucks items into container$(li)Self: Repels things$(li)Collision: Speed boost
$(l)On Armor$()$(br)$(li)Wield: Speed boost [amplify -> extra jump height/safe fall distance]$(li)Self: Magnets items in$(li)Collision: Repels attackers
$(l)On Tool$()$(br)$(li)Wield: Faster attack speed$(li)Self: Magnets items in$(li)Collision:Repel attacked
